mapper.insert: insert into book(isbn, title, catalogue, nation, publish_date, publisher, author, price, currency, description) values(#{isbn}, #{title}, #{catalogue}, #{nation}, now(), #{publisher}, #{author}, #{price}, #{currency}, #{description})
mapper.update: update book set title = #{title}, author = #{author}, publisher = #{publisher}, price = #{price}, description = #{description} where isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from book
